channel.title: Projects on CS 220
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on CS 220

item.title: Project - Spring 2018
item.description: In this project, you will be divided into six teams of five students, and will work collaboratively (both within your team and between teams) to create a complex software system that will involve not just designing and implementing a number of components, but also extending an existing software system. You will be using several tools to support the collaborative aspects of this project and, indeed, your collaborative skills will be as important as your coding skills to be successful in this project.
